TLINE.TDLINE: The interface IF_ISH_BUSINESS_OBJECT defines the interface of a business

The interface IF_ISH_BUSINESS_OBJECT includes the interface
Each business object has a main entity object.
These methods may only be called from the class

Returns the key of the active snapshot.
Returns the key of the business object.
Returns the messages for the invalidity status of the business object.
Returns the save status of the business object.
The possible values are defined by the constants CO_SAVESTAT_* and
correspond to the fixed values of the domain N1BOSAVESTATUS.
Returns the owners of the business object.
Returns whether a entity objects is managed by the business object.
Returns whether the business object has a specific owner.
Returns whether the business object has a specific snapshot.

Returns whether the business object is changed.

Returns whether the business object has been physically deleted from the
Returns whether a business object is invalid.
See also methods INVALIDATE and GET_INVALID_MESSAGES.
Returns whether a business object is flagged for deletion.
If a business object is flagged for deletion, it is deleted from the
database when a save is made (method SAVE).
Returns whether the business object is new.
A business object is new if it has no equivalent in the database.
Returns whether the business object is read-only.
Returns whether the business object is affected.
If a business object is affected, when a save is made the change data
(changed by, changed on, changed at) is updated even though the business
See also methods TOUCH and UNTOUCH.
Flags a business object for deletion.
Reloads the data of the business object from the database.
Resets the data of the business object to the instantiation time.
The class <DS:CL.CL_ISH_BOSAVER>CL_ISH_BOSAVER</> is used for the actual
Makes a snapshot of the business object data.
Each snapshot has a key (parameter R_SNAPKEY).
See also methods IS_TOUCHED and UNTOUCH.
Resets the data of the business object to a previously executed
See also methods SNAPSHOT, CLEAR_ALL_SNAPSHOTS and CLEAR_SNAPSHOT.
See also methods TOUCH and IS_TOUCHED.

und entsprechen den Festwerten der Domäne N1BOSAVESTATUS.

Returniert, ob das Geschäftsobjekt physisch aus der Datenbank gelöscht

Returniert, ob das Geschäftsobjekt nur lesbar ist.
Returniert, ob das Geschäftsobjekt berührt ist.
Wenn ein Geschäftsobjekt berührt ist, werden beim Sichern die
